Container.Name: OBS-NDI
Container.Overview:
Docker OBS and NDI (QT6)
This container is based on https://hub.docker.com/r/patrickstigler/obs-ndi. Due to some QT-changes in the OBS code the initial version by patrick needed some changes. To start the container:
docker run --shm-size=256m -it -e VNC_PASSWD=headless -p 5901:5901 -p 6901:6901 -p 4455:4455 asparon/obs-ndi:latest The shm-size argument is to make sure that the webclient does not run out of shared memory and crash.
You have to change the "Network Type" to "Custom: br0" in order to be able to find the NDI-Source of your desktop in the container an vice versa.
You can change the default VNC password of 'headless'.
You can connect with your own VNC client via 5901 or use the webclient at 6901. To enable GPU Support:
Nvidia:
add -e NVIDIA_VISIBLE_DEVICES=your_GPU_ID -e NVIDIA_DRIVER_CAPABILITIES=all and also add --runtime=nvidia as extra parameter. Intel:
add --device=/dev/dri (not tested yet)
Container.Requires: You have to change the "Network Type" to "Custom: br0" in order to be able to find the NDI-Source of your desktop in the container an vice versa.
